Class MsgLineCBoxModel

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.AbstractListModel<MsgLine>
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.dms.MsgLineCBoxModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ComboBoxModel<MsgLine>, ListModel<MsgLine>
public class MsgLineCBoxModel extends AbstractListModel<MsgLine> implements ComboBoxModel<MsgLine>
Model for a message line combo box.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter

    • setSelectedItem

      public void setSelectedItem(Object item)
      Set the selected item. This method is called by the combobox when: -the focus leaves the combobox with a String arg when editable. -a combobox item is clicked on via the mouse. -a combobox item is moved to via the cursor keys.
      Specified by:
      setSelectedItem in interface ComboBoxModel<MsgLine>
